column4: Hello , does its possible to use tar command to extract (tar archive) without the folders structure ? so all files will be extracted into 1 folder ?
no, that would need the tar to be editted before extraction which doesnt make sense
what i mean is that i have tar archive containing files and folders , i would like to extract the files to 1 folder without the folders structure from the archive ?
the folders are part of the tar.
